title: Remove android:allowBackup application attribute
message:
Remove android:allowBackup application attribute

The default value is true and having this attribute can conflict with apps that want to set it to false (causing build failures).

title: When you don't want to display the image immediately, it's better to get
message:
When you don't want to display the image immediately, it's better to get
an InputStream (as the common possible interface with minimum overhead).
